description: Creates a user under an Amazon Chime AppInstance. The request consists of a unique appInstanceUserId and Name for that user.

parameters.name: AppInstanceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstance request.

parameters.name: AppInstanceUserId
parameters.description: The user ID of the AppInstance.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: The unique ID of the request. Use different tokens to request additional AppInstances. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Tags assigned to the AppInstanceUser. (dict) --- A tag object containing a key-value pair. The key in a tag. The value in a tag.

parameters.name: ExpirationSettings
parameters.description: Settings that control the interval after which the AppInstanceUser is automatically deleted. The period in days after which an AppInstanceUser will be automatically deleted. Specifies the conditions under which an AppInstanceUser will expire.

nested_params.name: ExpirationDays
nested_params.description: The period in days after which an AppInstanceUser will be automatically deleted.

nested_params.name: ExpirationCriterion
nested_params.description: Specifies the conditions under which an AppInstanceUser will expire.
